name: MacDowell & Associates PC
tag_list: personal-injury, lawyer, fairfax, virginia, criminal-defense, law
overview:
MacDowell & Associates, P.C. is a Fairfax law firm specializing in criminal defense, DUI and DWI defense, and personal injury.

Since 1986, the criminal defense and personal injury legal teams at MacDowell & Associates, P.C. have successfully obtained favorable results for their clients. Their criminal law practice represents Virginians who have been accused, arrested and charged with DUI/DWI offenses, traffic violations, white collar crimes, credit card fraud, drug trafficking, assault, probation violation, expungement, violent crimes, juvenile crimes and underage drinking.

The personal injury legal team has a sparkling record for obtaining the compensation that their clients deserve. If you have been injured in an automobile accident, motorcycle accident, truck accident, suffered a spinal cord or brain injury, MacDowell & Associates can help.
